desc: The easily obtainable green fossil of a great beast's fang.

dictionary.lore: This green fang can be found in the mountains of Elgaia and all over Mistral. The biggest fangs can be as large as a human head. They are dense and heavy, making them perfect for weapons such as axes. They've been one of the most heavily used materials since ancient times due to how easy they are to obtain and process.

name: Green Fang
